body: This sled is several feet long and is designed to be pulled over snow and ice by a team of trained riding dogs. Most sleds have runners at the back for a musher to stand on. A dog sled can carry up to the carrying capacity of all the dogs that pull it.
name: Dog Sled
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Gear/Goods and Services/Animal-Related Gear/Dog Sled
